description:
The left claims to be the party all about choices, which is pretty rich considering the lack of choices they enforce on the rest of the world. This is especially true when it comes to education, as they believe school choice is evil. So, while parents are forced to either send their kids to failing public schools or pay the equivalent of their mortgage to a private school, there really is no choice for many people, as over half of Americans live paycheck to paycheck. Nonetheless, public schools were never intended to become indoctrination camps for the left, and someone should really inform the Dems that.

A group of concerned and religiously diverse paren
title: Ketanji Brown Jackson's excuse for why grade school LGBTQ indoctrination is constitutional is almost too silly for words

description:
Trump is ready to wrap up the Russia/Ukraine negotiations. But can Putin and Zelensky find common ground? Today’s show breaks it down.

"They start with the premise of, ‘It is ours if the US will pay for it,’" Crowder said. "How about you demand nothing, shut up, and take it?”

According to a Trump Truth Social post:

Ukrainian President, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, is boasting on the
title: Watch: Trump's DONE with Russia/Ukraine Shenanigans, Here's His Final Offer

description:
It’s unclear why the left believes that a person should automatically be granted special privileges at the expense of Americans just because they have broken federal immigration laws, but that reality could not be more evident in the State of Washington.

Washington state Democrats have passed a bill prioritizing criminal aliens for pardons and commutations. It’s unclear why they are more worthy of this than American citizens, but you don’t need any more evidence that the left despises the people they pretend to represent.

THIS IS MENTAL. Washington state Democrats just passed a bill moving illegal alien criminals to the front of the line for pardons and commutations. They hope it will make it harder for ICE to deport them after prison.
title: State Dems Pass Bill That Puts Criminal Aliens At Top Of List For Pardons And Commutations

description:
The United Kingdom wants to turn off the sun. If only there were a half-dozen science fiction stories that told us that was a bad idea. Oh, wait… Clarissa Ward has returned after she faked rescuing a Syrian prisoner. Now she’s in the Vatican and we’re wondering what she’s faking this time. The news media is making it sound like Texas governor Greg Abbott is helping developers build communities that house illegals. But is he really? President Donald Trump is done with Russia/Ukraine shenanigans. The negotiations continue, but it looks like Trump is ready to get this wrapped up. The only question left is whether Putin and Zelensky can play nice.

BRI
title: Trump Lays Down the Law on Ukraine & Russia: Take the Deal or We Walk (Sources)

description:
Once upon a time, there was a president named Joe Biden who appointed someone as his "Disinformation Czar." Nina Jankowicz was her name. She disappeared shortly after when the Democrat Party's desire (and the desire of the billionaires who control it) to control who is allowed on social media clashed with the First Amendment, but she's back! Nina has resurfaced in Europe, attacking our president and calling on the European Union to hold the line against free speech.

This was a blip in 2022. Jankowicz was named "Disinformation Czar." It turned out that her definition of disinformation is exactly what you thought it was... any opinion she
title: Biden's anti-American "Disinformation Czar" resurfaces in Europe, pleads with EU to RESIST Donald Trump and free speech
